text: Café Metropole is a 1937 American romantic comedy movie directed by Edward H. Griffith and based on the original story by Gregory Ratoff (who also stars). It stars Loretta Young, Tyrone Power, Adolphe Menjou, Helen Westley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 romantic comedy movies Category:1937 romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Edward H. Griffith
title: Café Metropole
